settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your AutoSubs preferences and options.

reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings, including transcription settings? This action cannot be undone.

importExport.dropHere: Drop file here or click to select

censor.title: Censor Words
censor.dialogDescription: Add words to be censored in the subtitles.

tracks.createTrack: Create an audio track in your current timeline to start transcribing.

fileDrop.aria: Drop audio file here or click to select

speakerEditor.title: Edit Speakers
speakerEditor.description: These are the speakers detected in the audio.
speakerEditor.name: Name

empty.welcomeDescription: Select an audio source to start generating subtitles.

englishOnly.title: English-Only Models
englishOnly.description: Show specialised English models with higher accuracy for English transcription.

manage.title: Models
manage.description: Delete cached models to free up disk space.
manage.confirmBody: This will delete the {{model}} model from your device. If you use this model in future it will need to be downloaded again.

tiny.label: Tiny
tiny.details: Fastest transcription with minimal memory. Ideal for quick drafts.

tiny_en.label: Tiny (English)
tiny_en.details: Fastest English transcription with minimal memory. Ideal for quick drafts.

base.label: Base
base.details: Reliable transcription with low memory requirements. Great for everyday use.

base_en.label: Base (English)
base_en.details: Reliable English transcription with low memory. Great for everyday use.

small.label: Small
small.details: Balanced speed and accuracy with moderate memory. Handles varied accents well.

small_en.label: Small (English)
small_en.details: Balanced speed and English accuracy with moderate memory. Handles varied accents.

medium.label: Medium
medium.details: High accuracy transcription with moderate speed and memory. Good for challenging audio.

medium_en.label: Medium (English)
medium_en.details: High accuracy English transcription with moderate speed. Good for challenging audio.

large_v3_turbo.label: Large Turbo
large_v3_turbo.details: Excellent accuracy with faster speed than Large model and moderate memory.

large_v3.label: Large
large_v3.details: Highest accuracy for complex audio, but slower and requires significant memory.

parakeet.label: Parakeet
parakeet.details: Excellent accuracy and speed for European languages.

moonshine_tiny.label: Moonshine Tiny
moonshine_tiny.details: Extremely fast on-device English transcription with minimal resources. Ideal for real-time use.

moonshine_tiny_ar.label: Moonshine Tiny (Arabic)
moonshine_tiny_ar.details: Fast on-device Arabic transcription with minimal resources.

moonshine_tiny_zh.label: Moonshine Tiny (Chinese)
moonshine_tiny_zh.details: Fast on-device Chinese transcription with minimal resources.

moonshine_tiny_ja.label: Moonshine Tiny (Japanese)
moonshine_tiny_ja.details: Fast on-device Japanese transcription with minimal resources.

moonshine_tiny_ko.label: Moonshine Tiny (Korean)
moonshine_tiny_ko.details: Fast on-device Korean transcription with minimal resources.

moonshine_tiny_uk.label: Moonshine Tiny (Ukrainian)
moonshine_tiny_uk.details: Fast on-device Ukrainian transcription with minimal resources.

moonshine_tiny_vi.label: Moonshine Tiny (Vietnamese)
moonshine_tiny_vi.details: Fast on-device Vietnamese transcription with minimal resources.

moonshine_base.label: Moonshine Base
moonshine_base.details: Fast on-device English transcription with better accuracy than Moonshine Tiny.

moonshine_base_es.label: Moonshine Base (Spanish)
moonshine_base_es.details: Fast on-device Spanish transcription with good accuracy.

completion.subtitlesReady: Your subtitles are ready to use!

empty.noSubtitlesAvailable: No subtitles available. Try importing some first.

subtitleEditor.title: Edit Subtitle
subtitleEditor.description: Edit the subtitle text by modifying the words below

languagePicker.title: Choose your language
languagePicker.description: Select the language you want to use in the app.

tooltip.canGetAudio: You can get audio from the timeline and add subtitles back to it.
tooltip.openResolve: Open DaVinci Resolve and go to Workspace → Scripts → AutoSubs
